forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a morning shower. Mostly cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High around 15C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a morning shower. Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High near 60F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 8C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 46F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low around 10C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 51F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 47F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 12C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low near 5C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 42F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High near 15C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 59F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds overnight. Low near 5C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 41F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High near 15C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 60F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low near 45F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High around 15C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High around 60F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
